completion:
{
    "dishName": "Pasta",
    "howTo": "Boil the pasta in salted water. Heat oil in a pan and add garlic and onion. Saute for a few minutes. Add the vegetables and saute for a few minutes. Add the tomato sauce and season with salt and pepper. Simmer for a few minutes. Add the cooked pasta and mix well. Serve hot.",
    "ingredients": [
        "Pasta",
        "Garlic",
        "Onion",
        "Vegetables",
        "Tomato Sauce",
        "Salt",
        "Pepper"
    ],

    "requiredQuantity": "Pasta - 500g, Garlic - 2 cloves, Onion - 1, Vegetables - 1 cup, Tomato Sauce - 1/2 cup, Salt - to taste, Pepper - to taste"
}

{ "dishName": "Pasta", "howTo": "

1. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the pasta and cook according to the package instructions until al dente. Drain and rinse under cold water.

2. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add the tomatoes, oregano, and red pepper flakes. Simmer for 10 minutes.

3. Add the cooked pasta to the sauce and toss to combine. Serve with freshly grated Parmesan cheese.

", "ingredients": [ "Pasta", "Olive Oil", "Garlic", "Tomatoes", "Oregano", "Red Pepper Flakes", "Parmesan Cheese" ], "requiredQuantity": "
Pasta1 lb
Olive Oil2 tablespoons
Garlic2 cloves, minced
Tomatoes2 cups, diced
Oregano1 teaspoon
Red Pepper Flakes1/4 teaspoon
Parmesan Cheese1/4 cup, grated
" }

{ "dishName": "Pasta", "howTo": "Boil the pasta in a pot of salted water. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add garlic and cook for 1 minute. Add the tomatoes and cook for 5 minutes. Add the cooked pasta to the skillet with the tomatoes. Add the basil, oregano, salt, and pepper. Toss to combine and cook for 1 minute.", "ingredients": [ "Pasta", "Olive Oil", "Garlic", "Tomatoes", "Basil", "Oregano", "Salt", "Pepper" ], "requiredQuantity": "
Pasta1 pound
Olive Oil2 tablespoons
Garlic2 cloves, minced
Tomatoes1 cup, diced
Basil1 teaspoon, chopped
Oregano1 teaspoon, chopped
Salt1/4 teaspoon
Pepper1/4 teaspoon
" }

{ "dishName": "Omelet", "howTo": "Beat eggs in a bowl. Add salt, pepper, and any other desired spices. Heat butter in a skillet over medium-high heat. Pour the egg mixture into the skillet. As the eggs begin to cook, gently pull the eggs across the pan with a spatula, forming large soft curds. When the eggs are nearly set, add the desired fillings on one side of the omelet. Use the spatula to fold the other half of the omelet over the filling. Slide the omelet onto a plate and serve.", "ingredients": [ "Eggs", "Salt", "Pepper", "Butter", "Fillings" ], "requiredQuantity": "
Eggs2
SaltAs per taste
PepperAs per taste
Butter2 tablespoons
FillingsAs per choice
" }

{ "dishName": "Omelet", "howTo": "Heat a non-stick pan over medium-high heat. Add butter and let it melt. Pour the beaten eggs into the pan. As the eggs start to set, gently pull the eggs across the pan with a spatula, forming large soft curds. When the eggs are thickened and no visible liquid egg remains, season with salt and pepper. Add desired fillings such as cheese, diced vegetables, or cooked meats. Fold the omelet in half with a spatula. Slide the omelet onto a plate and serve.", "ingredients": [ "Eggs", "Butter", "Salt", "Pepper", "Cheese", "Vegetables", "Meats" ], "requiredQuantity": "
Eggs2
Butter1 tablespoon
Saltto taste
Pepperto taste
Cheese1/4 cup
Vegetables1/4 cup
Meats1/4 cup
" }

{ "dishName": "Omelet", "howTo": "In a bowl, beat eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Heat a lightly oiled frying pan over medium high heat. Pour the egg mixture into the pan. As the egg mixture begins to set, gently pull the eggs across the pan with a spatula, forming large soft curds. When the eggs are thickened and no visible liquid egg remains, flip the omelet and cook for another 30 seconds. Slide the omelet onto a plate and serve.", "ingredients": [ "Eggs", "Milk", "Salt", "Pepper" ], "requiredQuantity": "
IngredientQuantity
Eggs2
Milk2 tablespoons
Salt1/4 teaspoon
Pepper1/4 teaspoon
" }

{
    "dishName": "Scrambled Eggs",
    "howTo": "Heat butter in a non-stick pan over medium heat. Add eggs and season with salt and pepper. Stir eggs with a rubber spatula, scraping the bottom of the pan as you stir. Continue stirring and scraping the bottom of the pan until eggs are softly scrambled and no visible liquid egg remains, about 3 minutes. Serve immediately.",
    "ingredients": [
        "Eggs",
        "Butter",
        "Salt",
        "Pepper"
    ],

    "requiredQuantity": "Eggs: 2-3, Butter: 1 tablespoon, Salt: to taste, Pepper: to taste"
}

{
    "dishName": "Scrambled Eggs",
    "howTo": "In a medium bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Heat butter in a medium skillet over medium heat. Add eggs and cook, stirring and scrambling gently with a spatula, until eggs are cooked through but still moist, about 5 minutes. Serve immediately.",
    "ingredients": [
        "Eggs",
        "Milk",
        "Salt",
        "Pepper",
        "Butter"
    ],
    "requiredQuantity": "Eggs: 4, Milk: 2 tablespoons, Salt: 1/4 teaspoon, Pepper: 1/4 teaspoon, Butter: 1 tablespoon"
}

{
    "dishName": "Scrambled Eggs",
    "howTo": "Heat butter in a non-stick pan over medium heat. Add eggs and season with salt and pepper. Stir the eggs with a spatula, scraping the bottom of the pan. Cook until the eggs are almost set. Remove from heat and serve.",
    "ingredients": [
        "Eggs",
        "Butter",
        "Salt",
        "Pepper"
    ],

    "requiredQuantity": "Eggs: 2-3; Butter: 1 tablespoon; Salt: to taste; Pepper: to taste"
}

{ "dishName": "Guacamole", "howTo": "Mash the avocados in a bowl. Add the lime juice, salt, diced onion, diced tomato, and cilantro. Mix until all ingredients are combined. Serve with chips or vegetables.", "ingredients": [ "Avocados", "Lime Juice", "Salt", "Onion", "Tomato", "Cilantro" ], "requiredQuantity": "
IngredientQuantity
Avocados2
Lime Juice1 tablespoon
Salt1/2 teaspoon
Onion1/4 cup, diced
Tomato1/4 cup, diced
Cilantro1 tablespoon, chopped
" }

{ "dishName": "Guacamole", "howTo": "In a medium bowl, mash together the avocados, lime juice, and salt. Mix in onion, cilantro, tomatoes, and garlic. Serve immediately, or cover and refrigerate until ready to serve.", "ingredients": [ "avocados", "lime juice", "salt", "onion", "cilantro", "tomatoes", "garlic" ], "requiredQuantity": "Avocados: 2-3
Lime Juice: 2 tablespoons
Salt: 1/2 teaspoon
Onion: 1/4 cup, diced
Cilantro: 2 tablespoons, chopped
Tomatoes: 1/2 cup, diced
Garlic: 1 clove, minced" }

{ "dishName": "Guacamole", "howTo": "Mash together avocado, onion, garlic, cilantro, lime juice, and salt. Serve with tortilla chips.", "ingredients": [ "Avocado", "Onion", "Garlic", "Cilantro", "Lime Juice", "Salt" ], "requiredQuantity": "Avocado: 2
Onion: 1/4 cup
Garlic: 1 clove
Cilantro: 2 tablespoons
Lime Juice: 1 tablespoon
Salt: 1/4 teaspoon" }

{ "dishName": "Grilled Chicken Avocado Salad", "howTo": "Preheat the grill to medium-high heat. Rub the chicken breasts with olive oil, salt, and pepper. Grill the chicken for 5-7 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Let the chicken cool before slicing. In a large bowl, combine the lettuce, tomatoes, avocado, corn, and black beans. Slice the chicken and add it to the salad. In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lime juice, garlic, cumin, salt, and pepper. Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to combine. Serve the salad with tortilla chips.", "ingredients": [ "Chicken Breasts", "Olive Oil", "Salt", "Pepper", "Lettuce", "Tomatoes", "Avocado", "Corn", "Black Beans", "Lime Juice", "Garlic", "Cumin", "Tortilla Chips" ], "requiredQuantity": "Chicken Breasts - 2
Olive Oil - 2 tablespoons
Salt - 1 teaspoon
Pepper - 1/2 teaspoon
Lettuce - 2 cups
Tomatoes - 1 cup
Avocado - 1
Corn - 1/2 cup
Black Beans - 1/2 cup
Lime Juice - 2 tablespoons
Garlic - 1 clove, minced
Cumin - 1/2 teaspoon
Tortilla Chips - 1/2 cup" }

{ "dishName": "Grilled Chicken Avocado Salad", "howTo": "Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Grill chicken for 5-7 minutes per side, or until cooked through. Let cool and cut into cubes. In a large bowl, combine lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, avocado, and chicken. In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, salt, and pepper. Pour over salad and toss to combine. Serve with croutons, if desired.", "ingredients": [ "Chicken", "Lettuce", "Tomatoes", "Cucumbers", "Avocado", "Olive Oil", "Lemon Juice", "Garlic", "Salt", "Pepper", "Croutons" ], "requiredQuantity": "Chicken: 2 breasts
Lettuce: 2 cups
Tomatoes: 1 cup
Cucumbers: 1 cup
Avocado: 1
Olive Oil: 2 tablespoons
Lemon Juice: 2 tablespoons
Garlic: 1 clove
Salt: 1/4 teaspoon
Pepper: 1/4 teaspoon
Croutons: 1/2 cup" }

{ "dishName": "Grilled Chicken Avocado Salad", "howTo": "1. Preheat your grill to medium-high heat. 2. Rub the chicken breasts with olive oil and season with salt and pepper. 3. Grill the chicken for about 5 minutes per side, until cooked through. 4. Let the chicken cool, then cut into cubes. 5. In a large bowl, combine the cubed chicken, diced avocado, cherry tomatoes, red onion, and cilantro. 6. In a small bowl, whisk together the olive oil, lime juice, garlic, cumin, and salt. 7. Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to combine. 8. Serve the salad immediately.", "ingredients": [ "Chicken Breasts", "Olive Oil", "Salt", "Pepper", "Avocado", "Cherry Tomatoes", "Red Onion", "Cilantro", "Lime Juice", "Garlic", "Cumin" ], "requiredQuantity": "Chicken Breasts: 2
Olive Oil: 2 tablespoons
Salt: 1/2 teaspoon
Pepper: 1/4 teaspoon
Avocado: 1, diced
Cherry Tomatoes: 1 cup
Red Onion: 1/4 cup, diced
Cilantro: 1/4 cup, chopped
Lime Juice: 2 tablespoons
Garlic: 1 clove, minced
Cumin: 1/4 teaspoon" }

{ "dishName": "Pesto Sauce", "howTo": "In a food processor, combine 2 cloves garlic, 2 cups fresh basil leaves, 1/2 cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese, 1/2 cup extra-virgin olive oil, 1/4 cup pine nuts, 1/4 teaspoon salt, and 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper. Pulse until the mixture is finely chopped. Taste and adjust the seasonings if desired.", "ingredients": [ "Garlic", "Basil leaves", "Parmesan cheese", "Extra-virgin olive oil", "Pine nuts", "Salt", "Black pepper" ], "requiredQuantity": "Garlic: 2 cloves
Basil leaves: 2 cups
Parmesan cheese: 1/2 cup
Extra-virgin olive oil: 1/2 cup
Pine nuts: 1/4 cup
Salt: 1/4 teaspoon
Black pepper: 1/4 teaspoon" }

{ "dishName": "Pesto Sauce", "howTo": "In a food processor, combine 2 cloves garlic, 1/2 cup toasted pine nuts, 2 cups fresh basil leaves, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper. Pulse until the ingredients are finely chopped. With the machine running, slowly add 1/2 cup extra-virgin olive oil in a steady stream. Add 1/2 cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese and pulse until combined. Taste and adjust seasoning if desired.", "ingredients": [ "Garlic", "Toasted Pine Nuts", "Fresh Basil Leaves", "Salt", "Freshly Ground Black Pepper", "Extra-Virgin Olive Oil", "Freshly Grated Parmesan Cheese" ], "requiredQuantity": "Garlic: 2 cloves
Toasted Pine Nuts: 1/2 cup
Fresh Basil Leaves: 2 cups
Salt: 1/2 teaspoon
Freshly Ground Black Pepper: 1/4 teaspoon
Extra-Virgin Olive Oil: 1/2 cup
Freshly Grated Parmesan Cheese: 1/2 cup" }

{ "dishName": "Pesto Sauce", "howTo": "In a food processor, combine 2 cups fresh basil leaves, 1/2 cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese, 1/2 cup extra-virgin olive oil, 1/3 cup pine nuts, 3 garlic cloves, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper. Pulse until the mixture is thoroughly blended and resembles a coarse paste, scraping down the sides of the food processor with a rubber spatula as needed.", "ingredients": [ "Basil Leaves", "Parmesan Cheese", "Extra-Virgin Olive Oil", "Pine Nuts", "Garlic Cloves", "Salt", "Black Pepper" ], "requiredQuantity": "
IngredientQuantity
Basil Leaves2 cups
Parmesan Cheese1/2 cup
Extra-Virgin Olive Oil1/2 cup
Pine Nuts1/3 cup
Garlic Cloves3
Salt1 teaspoon
Black Pepper1/4 teaspoon
" }

{ "dishName": "Chimichurri", "howTo": "In a food processor, combine garlic, parsley, oregano, red pepper flakes, red wine vinegar, olive oil, and salt. Pulse until the ingredients are finely chopped and combined. Taste and adjust seasoning as desired. Serve with grilled meats, fish, or vegetables.", "ingredients": [ "Garlic", "Parsley", "Oregano", "Red Pepper Flakes", "Red Wine Vinegar", "Olive Oil", "Salt" ], "requiredQuantity": "Garlic - 4 cloves
Parsley - 1/2 cup
Oregano - 1 teaspoon
Red Pepper Flakes - 1/2 teaspoon
Red Wine Vinegar - 2 tablespoons
Olive Oil - 1/2 cup
Salt - 1/2 teaspoon" }

{ "dishName": "Chimichurri", "howTo": "In a blender or food processor, combine the garlic, parsley, oregano, red pepper flakes, red wine vinegar, olive oil, and salt. Blend until smooth. Taste and adjust seasoning if necessary. Serve with grilled meats, fish, or vegetables.", "ingredients": [ "Garlic", "Parsley", "Oregano", "Red pepper flakes", "Red wine vinegar", "Olive oil", "Salt" ], "requiredQuantity": "Garlic - 2 cloves
Parsley - 1/2 cup
Oregano - 1 teaspoon

{ "dishName": "Chimichurri", "howTo": "In a blender, add garlic, parsley, oregano, red pepper flakes, red wine vinegar, olive oil, salt and pepper. Blend until smooth. Taste and adjust seasoning as needed. Serve with grilled meats, fish, or vegetables.", "ingredients": [ "Garlic", "Parsley", "Oregano", "Red Pepper Flakes", "Red Wine Vinegar", "Olive Oil", "Salt", "Pepper" ], "requiredQuantity": "Garlic - 2 cloves

Oregano - 1 teaspoon
Red Pepper Flakes - 1/2 teaspoon

Salt - 1 teaspoon
Pepper - 1/4 teaspoon" }

{ "dishName": "Pico de Gallo", "howTo": "Chop the tomatoes, onion, and jalapeno. Place the chopped ingredients in a bowl. Add the lime juice, cilantro, and salt. Mix everything together. Serve.", "ingredients": [ "Tomatoes", "Onion", "Jalapeno", "Lime juice", "Cilantro", "Salt" ], "requiredQuantity": "Tomatoes - 2
Onion - 1
Jalapeno - 1
Lime juice - 2 tablespoons
Cilantro - 2 tablespoons
Salt - 1 teaspoon" }

{ "dishName": "Pico de Gallo", "howTo": "In a medium bowl, combine the diced tomatoes, onion, jalapeno, cilantro, lime juice, and salt. Stir until everything is evenly mixed. Taste and adjust the seasoning as desired. Serve with chips, tacos, burritos, or as a topping for salads, eggs, and more.", "ingredients": [ "Tomatoes", "Onion", "Jalapeno", "Cilantro", "Lime Juice", "Salt" ], "requiredQuantity": "Tomatoes: 4, diced
Onion: 1/2, diced
Jalapeno: 1, seeded and diced
Cilantro: 2 tablespoons, chopped
Lime Juice: 2 tablespoons
Salt: 1/2 teaspoon" }

{ "dishName": "Pico de Gallo", "howTo": "Chop the tomatoes, onion, jalapeno, and cilantro. Mix all the ingredients in a bowl. Squeeze the lime juice over the mixture. Add salt and pepper to taste. Mix all the ingredients together and serve.", "ingredients": [ "Tomatoes", "Onion", "Jalapeno", "Cilantro", "Lime juice", "Salt", "Pepper" ], "requiredQuantity": "Tomatoes: 2-3
Onion: 1/2
Jalapeno: 1
Cilantro: 1/4 cup
Lime juice: 2 tablespoons
Salt: to taste
Pepper: to taste" }

{ "dishName": "Pickled Onions", "howTo": "Peel and thinly slice the onions. Place the onions in a large bowl and add the vinegar, sugar, salt, and spices. Stir everything together until the onions are evenly coated. Transfer the onions to a jar or airtight container and let them sit at room temperature for at least 1 hour before serving.", "ingredients": [ "Onions", "Vinegar", "Sugar", "Salt", "Spices" ], "requiredQuantity": "Onions: 2
Vinegar: 1/2 cup
Sugar: 2 tablespoons
Salt: 1 teaspoon
Spices: 1 teaspoon" }

{ "dishName": "Pickled Onions", "howTo": "1. Peel and thinly slice the onions. 2. Place the onions in a bowl and cover with boiling water. Let sit for 10 minutes. 3. Drain the onions and place in a large jar. 4. In a small saucepan, combine the vinegar, sugar, salt, and spices. Bring to a boil and stir until the sugar and salt dissolve. 5. Pour the hot liquid over the onions. 6. Let cool to room temperature, seal the jar, and refrigerate for at least 1 day before serving.", "ingredients": [ "Onions", "White Vinegar", "Sugar", "Salt", "Spices" ], "requiredQuantity": "
Onions2
White Vinegar1 cup
Sugar2 tablespoons
Salt1 teaspoon
Spices1 teaspoon
" }

{ "dishName": "Homemade Ranch Dressing", "howTo": "In a medium bowl, whisk together 1/2 cup mayonnaise, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1/4 cup buttermilk, 1/4 cup finely chopped fresh parsley, 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon onion powder, 1/2 teaspoon dried dill weed, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, and 1/8 teaspoon cayenne pepper. Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving.", "ingredients": [ "Mayonnaise", "Sour Cream", "Buttermilk", "Fresh Parsley", "Garlic Powder", "Onion Powder", "Dried Dill Weed", "Salt", "Black Pepper", "Cayenne Pepper" ], "requiredQuantity": "
Mayonnaise1/2 cup
Sour Cream1/2 cup
Buttermilk1/4 cup
Fresh Parsley1/4 cup
Garlic Powder1/2 teaspoon
Onion Powder1/2 teaspoon
Dried Dill Weed1/2 teaspoon
Salt1/4 teaspoon
Black Pepper1/4 teaspoon
Cayenne Pepper1/8 teaspoon
" }

{ "dishName": "Homemade Ranch Dressing", "howTo": "In a medium bowl, whisk together 1/2 cup mayonnaise, 1/2 cup sour cream, 1/4 cup buttermilk, 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/4 teaspoon onion powder, 1/4 teaspoon dried parsley, 1/4 teaspoon dried dill, 1/4 teaspoon salt, and 1/4 teaspoon pepper. Taste and adjust seasonings as desired. Cover and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving.", "ingredients": [ "Mayonnaise", "Sour Cream", "Buttermilk", "Garlic Powder", "Onion Powder", "Dried Parsley", "Dried Dill", "Salt", "Pepper" ], "requiredQuantity": "
Mayonnaise1/2 cup
Sour Cream1/2 cup
Buttermilk1/4 cup
Garlic Powder1/4 teaspoon
Onion Powder1/4 teaspoon
Dried Parsley1/4 teaspoon
Dried Dill1/4 teaspoon
Salt1/4 teaspoon
Pepper1/4 teaspoon
" }

{ "dishName": "Homemade Ranch Dressing", "howTo": "In a medium bowl, whisk together 1/2 cup mayonnaise, 1/4 cup buttermilk, 1/4 cup sour cream, 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon onion powder, 1/2 teaspoon dried parsley, 1/4 teaspoon dried dill, 1/4 teaspoon dried chives, 1/4 teaspoon salt, and 1/8 teaspoon pepper. Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving.", "ingredients": [ "Mayonnaise", "Buttermilk", "Sour Cream", "Garlic Powder", "Onion Powder", "Dried Parsley", "Dried Dill", "Dried Chives", "Salt", "Pepper" ], "requiredQuantity": "

Sour Cream1/4 cup

Salt1/4 teaspoon
Pepper1/8 teaspoon
" }

{ "dishName": "Chicken Adobo", "howTo": "In a large pot, combine chicken, garlic, soy sauce, vinegar, bay leaves, peppercorns, and enough water to cover the chicken. Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer for 45 minutes. Remove chicken from the pot and set aside. In a separate pan, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add chicken and fry until golden brown. Return chicken to the pot with the sauce. Simmer for an additional 10 minutes. Serve with steamed rice.", "ingredients": [ "Chicken", "Garlic", "Soy Sauce", "Vinegar", "Bay Leaves", "Peppercorns", "Water", "Oil" ], "requiredQuantity": "Chicken: 1kg
Garlic: 4 cloves
Soy Sauce: 1/2 cup
Vinegar: 1/2 cup
Bay Leaves: 2
Peppercorns: 1 teaspoon
Water: 4 cups
Oil: 1 tablespoon" }

{ "dishName": "Chicken Adobo", "howTo": "In a large pot, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add chicken and cook until lightly browned. Add garlic and cook for 1 minute. Add vinegar, soy sauce, bay leaves, and peppercorns. Bring to a boil, reduce heat to low, and simmer for 20 minutes. Add potatoes and simmer for 10 minutes. Add bell pepper and simmer for 5 minutes. Remove from heat and serve.", "ingredients": [ "Chicken", "Garlic", "Vinegar", "Soy sauce", "Bay leaves", "Peppercorns", "Potatoes", "Bell pepper" ], "requiredQuantity": "
IngredientQuantity
Chicken1 kg
Garlic6 cloves
Vinegar1/2 cup
Soy sauce1/2 cup
Bay leaves2
Peppercorns1 teaspoon
Potatoes2
Bell pepper1
" }

{ "dishName": "Chicken Adobo", "howTo": "In a large saucepan, combine the soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, bay leaves, peppercorns, and chicken. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat, then reduce heat to low and simmer for 25 minutes. Add the potatoes and simmer for an additional 10 minutes. Remove the chicken and potatoes from the saucepan and set aside. Increase the heat to medium-high and reduce the sauce until thickened, about 10 minutes. Return the chicken and potatoes to the saucepan and toss to coat with the sauce. Serve with steamed white rice.", "ingredients": [ "Soy sauce", "Vinegar", "Garlic", "Bay leaves", "Peppercorns", "Chicken", "Potatoes" ], "requiredQuantity": "Soy sauce: 1/2 cup
Vinegar: 1/2 cup
Garlic: 4 cloves, minced
Bay leaves: 2
Peppercorns: 1 teaspoon
Chicken: 2 pounds, cut into 8 pieces
Potatoes: 2 large, cut into 1-inch cubes" }

{ "dishName": "Spanish Garlic Shrimp", "howTo": "In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add garlic and cook, stirring, until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add shrimp and cook, stirring, until shrimp are pink and cooked through, about 3 minutes. Add paprika, cumin, salt, and pepper and cook, stirring, until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add tomatoes and cook until softened, about 3 minutes. Add parsley and cook, stirring, until just wilted, about 1 minute. Serve with crusty bread.", "ingredients": [ "Olive oil", "Garlic", "Shrimp", "Paprika", "Cumin", "Salt", "Pepper", "Tomatoes", "Parsley" ], "requiredQuantity": "
IngredientQuantity
Olive oil2 tablespoons
Garlic3 cloves, minced
Shrimp1 pound, peeled and deveined
Paprika1 teaspoon
Cumin1 teaspoon
Salt1/2 teaspoon
Pepper1/4 teaspoon
Tomatoes1 cup, diced
Parsley1/4 cup, chopped
" }

{ "dishName": "Spanish Garlic Shrimp", "howTo": "In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add garlic and cook, stirring, until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add shrimp and season with salt and pepper. Cook, stirring occasionally, until shrimp are pink and cooked through, about 4 minutes. Add parsley and lemon juice and stir to combine. Serve hot.", "ingredients": [ "Olive Oil", "Garlic", "Shrimp", "Salt", "Pepper", "Parsley", "Lemon Juice" ], "requiredQuantity": "
Olive Oil2 tablespoons
Garlic2 cloves, minced
Shrimp1 pound, peeled and deveined
Salt1/2 teaspoon
Pepper1/4 teaspoon
Parsley2 tablespoons, chopped
Lemon Juice1 tablespoon
" }

{ "dishName": "Spanish Garlic Shrimp", "howTo": "In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add garlic and cook, stirring, until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add shrimp and season with salt and pepper. Cook, stirring occasionally, until shrimp are pink and cooked through, about 3 minutes. Add paprika, oregano, and lemon juice. Cook for 1 minute more. Serve with lemon wedges and parsley.", "ingredients": [ "Olive oil", "Garlic cloves", "Shrimp", "Salt", "Pepper", "Smoked paprika", "Dried oregano", "Lemon juice", "Lemon wedges", "Fresh parsley" ], "requiredQuantity": "
Olive oil2 tablespoons
Garlic cloves4, minced
Shrimp1 lb, peeled and deveined
SaltTo taste
PepperTo taste
Smoked paprika1 teaspoon
Dried oregano1 teaspoon
Lemon juice2 tablespoons
Lemon wedgesFor serving
Fresh parsleyFor serving
" }

{ "dishName": "Avocado Berry Smoothie", "howTo": "Add 1/2 cup of frozen berries, 1/2 an avocado, 1/2 cup of almond milk, 1/2 cup of plain yogurt, 1 teaspoon of honey and 1/2 teaspoon of vanilla extract into a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a glass and enjoy!", "ingredients": [ "Frozen Berries", "Avocado", "Almond Milk", "Plain Yogurt", "Honey", "Vanilla Extract" ], "requiredQuantity": "
Frozen Berries1/2 cup
Avocado1/2
Almond Milk1/2 cup
Plain Yogurt1/2 cup
Honey1 teaspoon
Vanilla Extract1/2 teaspoon
" }

{ "dishName": "Avocado Berry Smoothie", "howTo": "Blend together 1/2 cup of frozen blueberries, 1/2 cup of frozen strawberries, 1/2 an avocado, 1/2 cup of almond milk, 1/2 teaspoon of honey, and 1/2 teaspoon of vanilla extract until smooth.", "ingredients": [ "Frozen Blueberries", "Frozen Strawberries", "Avocado", "Almond Milk", "Honey", "Vanilla Extract" ], "requiredQuantity": "
Frozen Blueberries1/2 cup
Frozen Strawberries1/2 cup
Avocado1/2
Almond Milk1/2 cup
Honey1/2 teaspoon
Vanilla Extract1/2 teaspoon
" }

{ "dishName": "Avocado Berry Smoothie", "howTo": "Combine 1/2 cup of frozen berries, 1/2 an avocado, 1/2 cup of almond milk, 1/2 teaspoon of honey, and 1/4 teaspoon of vanilla extract in a blender. Blend until smooth. Serve and enjoy!", "ingredients": [ "Frozen Berries", "Avocado", "Almond Milk", "Honey", "Vanilla Extract" ], "requiredQuantity": "
IngredientQuantity
Frozen Berries1/2 cup
Avocado1/2
Almond Milk1/2 cup
Honey1/2 teaspoon
Vanilla Extract1/4 teaspoon
" }

{ "dishName": "Butter Chicken", "howTo": "1. Heat oil in a pan and add the ginger, garlic and onion. Cook until the onion is soft. 2. Add the tomato puree and cook for a few minutes. 3. Add the garam masala, chilli powder, cumin powder, coriander powder and turmeric and cook for a few minutes. 4. Add the chicken and cook for a few minutes. 5. Add the cream and butter and cook for a few minutes. 6. Add the coriander leaves and cook for a few minutes. 7. { "dishName": "Roti", "howTo": "Mix the flour, salt and oil together in a bowl. Add water and knead the dough until it is soft. Divide the dough into small balls. Take one ball and roll it out on a lightly floured surface into a thin circle. Heat a tawa or griddle over medium heat. Place the rolled out roti on the hot tawa. Cook for a few seconds. Flip the roti and cook the other side. Apply a little oil or ghee on the roti and cook for a few more seconds. Flip the roti again and press it lightly with a spatula. Cook for a few more seconds. Remove the roti from the tawa and serve hot.", "ingredients": [ "Flour", "Salt", "Oil", "Water" ], "requiredQuantity": "Flour - 2 cups
Salt - 1/2 teaspoon
Oil - 1 tablespoon
Water - 1/2 cup" }

{ "dishName": "Roti", "howTo": "In a bowl, mix together 2 cups of whole wheat flour, 1 teaspoon of salt and 1 teaspoon of oil. Add water gradually and knead the dough until it is soft and pliable. Cover the dough and let it rest for 10 minutes. Divide the dough into 8 equal portions. Take one portion and roll it into a circle of 6 inches in diameter. Heat a tawa or griddle and place the roti on it. Cook on one side for a few seconds and then flip it over. Apply a few drops of oil on the cooked side and flip it over again. Cook the other side until it is golden brown. Remove the roti from the tawa and serve hot.", "ingredients": [ "Whole Wheat Flour", "Salt", "Oil", "Water" ], "requiredQuantity": "
Whole Wheat Flour2 cups
Salt1 teaspoon
Oil1 teaspoon
WaterAs required
" }

{ "dishName": "Coca-Cola Cake", "howTo": "Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease and flour a 9x13 inch pan. In a large bowl, combine cake mix, melted butter, eggs, and Coca-Cola. { "dishName": "Coca-Cola Cake", "howTo": "
  1. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease and flour a 9x13 inch pan.
  2. In a large bowl, combine cake mix, melted butter, eggs and Coca-Cola. Beat for 2 minutes.
  3. Pour batter into prepared pan.
  4. Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 35 minutes. Let cool.
  5. In a medium bowl, combine confectioners' sugar, cocoa, butter, milk and vanilla. Beat until smooth.
  6. Spread over cooled cake.
", "ingredients": [ "Cake Mix", "Butter", "Eggs", "Coca-Cola", "Confectioners' Sugar", "Cocoa", "Butter", "Milk", "Vanilla" ], "requiredQuantity": "

{
    "dishName": "Tandoori Chicken",
    "howTo": "Mix the yogurt, garlic, ginger, garam masala, cumin, paprika, cayenne, and salt together in a bowl. Add the chicken and coat with the marinade. { "dishName": "Chicken Tikka Masala", "howTo": "In a large bowl, combine the yogurt, garlic, ginger, garam masala, cumin, cayenne pepper, and salt. Add the chicken and turn to coat. Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes. Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic and ginger and cook for 1 minute. Basmati Rice: 4 cups, cooked" }

{ "dishName": "Chicken Tikka Masala", "howTo": "In a large bowl, combine the yogurt, lemon juice, garlic, ginger, garam masala, cumin, cayenne pepper, and salt. Add the chicken and stir to coat. Bake in the preheated oven until the chicken is cooked through and no longer pink in the center, about 25 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C). Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes. Stir in the garlic and ginger; cook until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add the tomato sauce, cream, garam masala, cumin, and cayenne pepper. { "dishName": "Chicken Tikka Masala", "howTo": "To make chicken tikka masala, start by marinating the chicken in a mixture of yogurt, lemon juice, garlic, ginger, and spices. Then, thread the chicken onto skewers and cook it on a grill or in the oven. Next, make the masala sauce by heating oil in a pan and adding onions, garlic, and ginger. Finally, add the cooked chicken, tomato puree, and cream to the sauce and simmer it for 10 minutes.

To serve, garnish the chicken tikka masala with cilantro and serve it with rice or naan.", "ingredients": [ "Chicken", "Yogurt", "Lemon Juice", "Garlic", "Ginger", "Spices", "Oil", "Onions", "Tomato Puree", "Cream", "Cilantro" ], "requiredQuantity": "

Yogurt2 cups
Lemon Juice2 tablespoons
Garlic2 cloves
Ginger1 teaspoon
Spices1 teaspoon
Oil2 tablespoons
Onions1 cup
Tomato Puree1 cup
Cream1/2 cup
Cilantro1/4 cup
" }##EOF##

{ "dishName": "Chicken Tikka Masala", "howTo": "In a large bowl, combine the yogurt, garlic, ginger, garam masala, cumin, cayenne pepper, and salt. Add the chicken and turn to coat. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Grease a baking sheet with oil. Place the chicken pieces on the prepared baking sheet. Bake in the preheated oven until no longer pink in the center, about 20 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C). Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes. Stir in the garlic and ginger; cook for 1 minute. Add the tomato sauce, cream, garam masala, cumin, and cayenne pepper. Simmer over low heat for 10 minutes. Add the cooked chicken and simmer for 10 minutes. Serve with rice.", "ingredients": [ "Yogurt", "Garlic", "Ginger", "Garam Masala", "Cumin", "Cayenne Pepper", "Salt", "Chicken", "Oil", "Onion", "Tomato Sauce", "Cream" ], "requiredQuantity": "Yogurt - 1/2 cup
Garlic - 1 clove, minced
Ginger - 1 teaspoon, minced
Garam Masala - 1 teaspoon
Cumin - 1 teaspoon
Cayenne Pepper - 1/2 teaspoon
Salt - 1/2 teaspoon
Chicken - 4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves
Oil - 1 tablespoon
Onion - 1, chopped
Tomato Sauce - 1 (8 ounce) can
Cream - 1/2 cup" }##EOF##
